sentences.en: A measure or bar is a metrical unit, the space between two bar - lines.
sentences.cn: 小节是度量单位, 即两条小节线之间的部分.

sentences.en: A particular arrangement of words in poetry, such as iambic pentameter, determined by the kind and number of metrical units in a line.
sentences.cn: 格律：诗歌中字词的特定安排，由一行诗中韵律单位的类型和数量而定，如抑扬格五音步诗行。

sentences.en: A single metrical line in a poetic composition ; one line of poetry.
sentences.cn: 有固定韵律的包括十四个诗句的诗.

sentences.en: And technology of metrical error correction is the focus of technology of near field measurement.
sentences.cn: 而测量误差的补偿技术研究是近场测量技术的焦点问题.

sentences.en: Art of composition of Du Fu's metrical verses show different structures because of different materials.
sentences.cn: 杜甫律诗的章法,因题材不同而表现为不同的格局.

sentences.en: Chinese metrical verse sound pattern contents rhythm and the rules of rhyming.
sentences.cn: 律诗的声律模式包括节奏和韵律两部分.

sentences.en: Dividing the pixel size by the metrical size gives you a resolution.
sentences.cn: 度量大小除像素大小得到分辨率.

sentences.en: English metrical verse mainly involves three problems:rhyme, type of translation and inheritance of style.
sentences.cn: 英语格律诗的翻译主要涉及节奏、译文的体裁、风格的继承三大问题。

sentences.en: He emphasizes rhythmic time, metrical harmonious beauty, and clean and tidy sentence structure so as to form a unique writing style to impress readers with changes of tidiness and terseness.
sentences.cn: 余秋雨的散文集《文化苦旅》大胆借鉴非散文文体语言，其散文语言注重节奏的合拍、韵律的谐美、句式的整齐，构成了独特的话语风格、富于变化的整齐美。

sentences.en: If you are unwilling or unable to write metrical poems, you can try vers libre.
sentences.cn: 要是你不愿意或不会写格律诗, 你可以写自由体诗.

sentences.en: If you want to write a metrical poem, you must follow the rules and forms.
sentences.cn: 如果你要写一首格律诗, 你一定要按照所有的格律来写.

sentences.en: Methods A quasi - metrical function, some analytical techniques and some properties of topology space are used.
sentences.cn: 方法在拓扑空间中引用拟度量函数, 再结合拓扑空间本身的性质和某些分析技巧.

sentences.en: Metrical products because of elegance, another hand - made, fine wood, beautiful appearance of generosity.
sentences.cn: 因产品格律优雅, 又有手工制作, 木质优良, 外观优美大方.

sentences.en: Precise metrical model of steering axle inclination ( SAI ) is built for analyzing the four - wheel aligners � � metrical error.
sentences.cn: 为解决四轮定位仪测量主销内倾的精度问题,建立了精确的内倾测量模型.

sentences.en: The iteration of geo - metrical programming with constrained positive - negative term equations is used.
sentences.cn: 结果表明:该法与其它优化方法比较,可降低问题的困难度.

sentences.en: The site also includes a select bibliography and a metrical introduction to quantitative verse.
sentences.cn: 该点包括可选数目和音量的测试介绍.

sentences.en: There are strict requirements on sound meter in our nation's metrical verses.
sentences.cn: 我国的格律诗对于声律有严格要求.

sentences.en: With the development of laser - based metrical technique, online detecting and controlling technology has been widely used.
sentences.cn: 激光测量技术的发展使在线检测与控制技术得到广泛应用.
